name: Hop Spring Girl
description:
"Hop Spring Girl" is a 2D platform action game where you aim to reach the top by controlling hopping.
Determine the direction with the stick, adjust the jumping power at the timing of the jump, and overcome many difficulties.

The main character will jump up and down on her own, so be careful not to miss the timing of her jumps.
Once you jump, you can't control it until you land, so jump carefully and proceed.


Control direction with stick


Jumping power changes depending on timing
